auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.resetPasswordEmailSentMessage: Password reset link has been sent to your email address. Please check your email.
auth.resetPasswordError: Failed to send password reset link
auth.checkYourEmail: Check your email and click the link to reset your password.
auth.resetPasswordCodeDescription: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your email and your new password.
auth.invalidCode: Invalid code. Please enter a 6-digit code.
auth.passwordResetSuccessMessage: Your password has been successfully changed. You can now login with your new password.

home.title: Home
home.searchPlaceholder: Search for products, brands or categories

cart.title: My Cart
cart.tobaccoExcluded: * Tobacco products are not included in the minimum amount
cart.maxQuantityMessage: For security reasons, you can add a maximum of {{max}} units of this product to your cart.

orders.title: My Orders
orders.noOrdersText: You don't have any orders yet.
orders.loginRequiredText: You need to login to view your orders.
orders.cancelOrderMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel this order? This action cannot be undone.
orders.cancelReasonPlaceholder: E.g: Changed my mind, ordered by mistake...
orders.orderCancelledMessage: Your order has been successfully cancelled.
orders.cancelErrorMessage: Failed to cancel order. Please try again.
orders.cannotCancelOrder: This order cannot be cancelled. Only orders in preparing or prepared status can be cancelled.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.phoneHint: Enter your phone number without leading 0
profile.addDeliveryLocationText: Add your location to ensure your orders are delivered to the correct address
profile.loginToViewProfileText: Login to your account to track your orders and manage your profile.
profile.profileUpdateError: An error occurred while updating profile
profile.enterFullName: Please enter your first and last name
profile.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number (numbers only)
profile.deleteAccountWarning: If you want to permanently delete your account, click the button below. This action cannot be undone.
profile.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account? This action cannot be undone and all your data will be deleted.
profile.deleteAccountFinalConfirm: This action cannot be undone. All your orders, coupons, and data will be permanently deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
profile.deleteAccountSuccessMessage: Your account has been successfully deleted. Thank you for choosing us.
profile.deleteAccountError: An error occurred while deleting account
profile.securityDescription: We recommend changing your password regularly for your account security.
profile.passwordTooShort: New password must be at least 6 characters
profile.samePassword: New password cannot be the same as current password
profile.passwordChangeSuccessMessage: Your password has been successfully changed
profile.passwordChangeError: An error occurred while changing password
profile.orderNotificationsDesc: Get notified about your order status
profile.promotionalNotificationsDesc: Receive information about special offers and campaigns
profile.notificationPermissionDesc: You need to grant notification permission from device settings.
profile.notificationInfoDesc: Order notifications help you track your order status. Promotional notifications keep you updated on special offers. System notifications are required for important updates.
profile.permissionDeniedDesc: You need to grant notification permission from device settings to use notifications.
profile.notificationPermissionAlert: You need to grant notification permission from device settings first.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.orderNotePlaceholder: E.g: Doorbell is broken, please call...
checkout.orderSuccessMessage: Your order has been successfully placed. You can track it from My Orders page.
checkout.outsideServiceAreaMessage: The selected location is outside our service area. Please select a different location.
checkout.locationPermissionNeeded: We need permission to access your location
checkout.addressDetailsPlaceholder: Enter building name, floor, apartment no, directions...
checkout.phoneRequired: Phone number is required for delivery
checkout.phoneCanUpdate: You can update your phone number
checkout.loginToCheckoutMessage: Please login or register to complete your order.
checkout.whatsappHelpMessage: Hello, I need help with my order.
checkout.whatsappNotInstalledMessage: WhatsApp application is not installed on your device.
checkout.outOfStockMessage: The following products are out of stock. Please update your cart:
checkout.validationError: Order validation error. Please try again.
checkout.quantityLimitExceeded: Some products exceed the maximum quantity limit:
checkout.rateLimitMessage: You have made too many order attempts. Please try again in a few minutes.
checkout.deviceBannedMessage: This device has been banned due to security violations.

admin.noOrdersText: There are no active orders at the moment.
admin.unauthorizedMessage: You don't have permission to access this page.

workingHours.noteMessage: Orders placed outside these hours will be processed on the next business day.

ageVerification.title: Age Verification
ageVerification.description: Our app sells alcohol and tobacco products. You must be 18 years or older to continue.
ageVerification.question: Are you 18 years or older?
ageVerification.legal: By using this app, you confirm that you are 18 years or older.
ageVerification.restrictedMessage: Sorry, this app is not suitable for users under 18 years old.
